thread.title: Okposo helps Islanders hand Sharks their 1st loss, 6-3
thread.title_full: Okposo helps Islanders hand Sharks their 1st loss, 6-3

title: Okposo helps Islanders hand Sharks their 1st loss, 6-3
text:
> Sports Okposo helps Islanders hand Sharks their 1st loss, 6-3 New York Islanders goalie Jaroslav Halak (41) and defenseman Nick Leddy (2) defend the net against a shot by San Jose Sharks center Joe Thornton (19) during the first period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015 in New York. (AP Photo/Mary Altaffer)
